00009 struct TimeSeriesDataset {
00010         std::string description;
00011         RGB color;
00012         std::vector<float> rawData;
00013         std::vector<float> sampleIntervalMin; // Subsampled data: Overview Mode
00014         std::vector<float> sampleIntervalMax;
00015         std::vector<float> filteredSamples; // Subsampled data: Filtering mode
00016         bool calculateOverview;
00017         bool calculateFiltering;
00018 
00019         TimeSeriesDataset(std::string name, RGB rgb, uint size)
00020         : description(name),
00021           color(rgb),
00022           rawData(size),
00023           calculateOverview(true),
00024           calculateFiltering(true) {}
00025 };
00026 
00027 typedef std::map<std::string, TimeSeriesDataset> Timeseries;
